snippet.title: Fruits of Fury Demo Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Announcing that the Demo for Fruits of Fury will be available 6th of November!

Fruits of Fury is one of the most exciting upcoming games on Steam at the moment and you can wishlist and follow here 👇:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2498080/Fruits_of_Fury/

Fruits of Fury is like the popular games Vampire Survivors, Brotato, 20 minutes until Dawn, Soulstone Survivors and Holocure, but instead you will fight different cute fruit minions using unique and powerful abilities that you can unlocked and upgrade as you earn prizes and rewards. 

THEN at the 10 minute mark, step into the ring to battle the larger-than-life fruits that have been transformed. This game is perfect for roguelike and roguelite fans looking for an exciting upcoming game that brings something different to the genre.

Here are some more details about what you can do in the game:
- Slice through waves of cute fruit minions, with abilities that grow stronger each level!

- Forge your own path by experimenting with combinations of powerful offensive and defensive abilities such as the Seed Bazooka, Bird Blaster, Slice Shotgun, and Trunk Slam!

- Survive 10 minutes and then step into the wrestling ring to fight your favorite fruits which have been transformed into monstrous wrestling champions!

- Each fruit boss is fully voice acted and has unique boss mechanics. Fight them in epic 1v1 battles. No more bullet sponges!

- Each run is different from the last in this roguelike, different power ups can appear, different bosses to fight and every minute different events can occur, such as powerful treasure dropping from the sky, massive fruit enemies or helpful powerups!

- Earn prize money on your journey from rookie to legend and unlock more abilities and upgrade them to new heights.

- Collect the most outrageous wrestling gear known to man, giving you style points and powerful buffs to your skills, taking ability combinations to near infinite levels!

#pcgaming   #gaming  #trailer   #trending   #viral  #roguelike #roguelite #vampiresurvivor #brotato #20minutestilldawn #hallsoftorment  #gaming #game  #trailers #gametrailers #unrealengine #unrealengine5 #bulletheaven #bullethell
